cc.scada
Class SCADA

java.lang.Object
  cc.scada.SCADA

public class SCADA
extends java.lang.Object

Implementation of the Supervisory Control And Data Acquisition of the CakeChuff system

Version:
1.0, 29/05/09
Author:
CaKeChuff team

 java.lang.String sendAutomatonInfo3()
          Inform about the data of the automaton 3
 java.lang.String sendInitInfo()
          Compress all the initial info needed by the CakeChuff system Begin with the word INIT, follow by ":" and all the data of the subsystems, separed by "$" The different field for each subsystem are divided by "#" The order is A1(numcakes#speed#lenght#choc#caramel), A2(speed#lenght), A3(speed#lenght#failurerate#timepack#robot), R1 (pick#move)
 java.lang.String sendResetInfo()
          Compress all the info needed to recover the CakeChuff system Begin with the word RESET, follow by ":" and all the data of the subsystems, separed by "$" The different field for each subsystem are divided by "#", and the first one is the state where the subsystem was stopped The order is A1(state#numcakes#speed#length#choc#caramel), A2(state#speed#length), A3(state#s_robot#speed#length#failurerate#timepack#robot), R1 (state#pick#move)
 java.lang.String sendRestartInfo(java.lang.String subsystem_name)
          Compress all the info needed to restart one subsystem, in response a petition from the Master automaton

subsystem - Name of the subsystem (ss1Info, ss2Info, ss3Info, robot)

value Value of the tag

sendAutomatonInfo1

public java.lang.String sendAutomatonInfo1()
Compress all the information of one automaton into a string message, to be sent to the automaton

Returns:
send String with all the data split by the symbol "#"

sendAutomatonInfo2

public java.lang.String sendAutomatonInfo2()
Inform about the speed of the conveyor belt for the automaton 2

Returns:
String containing the speed value

sendAutomatonInfo3

public java.lang.String sendAutomatonInfo3()
Inform about the data of the automaton 3

Returns:
send String containing the information of the automaton 3

sendInitInfo

public java.lang.String sendInitInfo()
Compress all the initial info needed by the CakeChuff system Begin with the word INIT, follow by ":" and all the data of the subsystems, separed by "$" The different field for each subsystem are divided by "#" The order is A1(numcakes#speed#lenght#choc#caramel), A2(speed#lenght), A3(speed#lenght#failurerate#timepack#robot), R1 (pick#move)

Returns:
s String containing all the initial info

sendResetInfo

public java.lang.String sendResetInfo()
Compress all the info needed to recover the CakeChuff system Begin with the word RESET, follow by ":" and all the data of the subsystems, separed by "$" The different field for each subsystem are divided by "#", and the first one is the state where the subsystem was stopped The order is A1(state#numcakes#speed#length#choc#caramel), A2(state#speed#length), A3(state#s_robot#speed#length#failurerate#timepack#robot), R1 (state#pick#move)

Returns:
s String containing all the recovery info

sendRestartInfo

public java.lang.String sendRestartInfo(java.lang.String subsystem_name)
Compress all the info needed to restart one subsystem, in response a petition from the Master automaton

Returns:
s String containing the info needed to restart one subsystem

stop

public java.lang.String stop()
Compress a STOP message to be sent to the master automaton

Returns:
A The stop message

public java.lang.String emergencyStop()
Compress a EMERGENCY STOP message to be sent to the master automaton

Returns:
A The stop message

stateChanged

public boolean stateChanged(java.lang.String info)
Receive a message from the master automaton with the info about the change in the state of a subsystem Check the subsystem which belongs the info Change the state in the database

Parameters:
info - Subsystem_name + ":" + state
Returns:
false If the info does not correspond to any subsystem
